name: HSP_PRE_AR_AUTH_ID
description: This table contains the auth ID information for hospital billing temporary transactions. This table is limited to charge temporary transactions that have not yet been posted to the account.

columns.name: HTT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: AUTH_ID
columns.description: This column contains the list of authorization records linked to a charge.
